product_name: Salomon Runner Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The lightweight, breathable Salomon Runner Tank Top offers cool comfort so you can keep pushing the pace, even in hot weather. Lightweight polyester fabric transfers moisture from your skin to the outer fabric surface where it quickly evaporates. Stretchy mesh inserts along sides, back and straps increase breathability. Flatlock seams maximize motion and minimize abrasion; reflective logos increase visibility in low light. The Salomon Runner Tank Top offers an active fit that skims the body without being tight. Closeout.
short_description: The lightweight, breathable Salomon Runner Tank Top offers cool comfort so you can keep pushing the pace, even in hot weather.
